articles.title: Ram ends EV pickup truck plans

articles.title: Via shrugs off tepid open to end first day of trading slightly above IPO price
articles.description: Transit tech software startup Via had its IPO debut on Friday, starting at below offering price before rising to close at nearly $50.
articles.author: Rebecca Bellan

articles.title: Pilot union urges FAA to reject Rainmaker’s drone cloud-seeding plan
articles.description: Rainmaker wants to use flares to seed clouds — the airline pilots' union says it won't be safe.

articles.description: All four of the devices will be available to preorder on Friday and will be available on September 19.

articles.title: Apple delays release of iPhone Air in China due to pending approval of eSIM
